title: IHSG Expected to Continue Strengthening Amid US Tariff Negotiations
body: The Jakarta Composite Index (IHSG) is likely to continue its upward trend at the start of this week, driven by developments in US tariff negotiations. The IHSG rose by 0.6% to 7,047.43 on Friday, marking a 2.65% increase over the week.

title: IHSG Rebounds Above 7,000 Mark with a 2.65% Growth in July 2025
body: The Indonesian Composite Stock Price Index (IHSG) has risen above the 7,000 level for the first time since June 18, 2025, closing at 7,047.43 on Friday. This marks a 2.65% increase in the index's movement from July 7 to July 11, 2025.

title: PT Petrosea (PTRO) Sees Increased Share Purchases by Major Stakeholders
body: PT Kreasi Jasa Persada, the largest shareholder of PT Petrosea (PTRO), has increased its holdings by 91 million shares, now owning 45.29% of the total shares. The number of PTRO shareholders rose to 57,800 as of June 30, 2025, with an addition of 730 new investors.
